{{NCAATeamSeason |Mode = football |Year = 2009 |Team = FIU Golden Panthers |Image =Florida International University FIU logo.svg |ImageSize = |Conference = Sun Belt Conference |ShortConference = SBC |Record = 3â9 |ConfRecord = 3â5 |HeadCoach = [[Mario Cristobal]] |OffCoach = Bill Legg |DefCoach = Phil Galiano |OScheme =[[Offensive philosophy (American football)#The Spread|Spread]] |DScheme =[[4-3]] |StadiumArena =[[FIU Stadium]] }} {{2009 Sun Belt football standings}} The '''2009 FIU Golden Panthers football team''' represented [[Florida International University]] during their 5th [[2008 NCAA Division I FBS football season|season]] of [[NCAA]] [[Football Bowl Subdivision|Division I FBS]] [[College football|football]] and their 8th season overall. The team was coached by [[Mario Cristobal]] and played their homes games at the on-campus [[FIU Stadium]]. The Golden Panthers finished the season 3â9 and 3â5 in [[2009 Sun Belt Conference football season|Sun Belt]]. ==Regular season== {{Empty section|date=June 2010}} ==Schedule== {{CFB Schedule Start
